name: Kart Speed Racing 3D
description:
Kart Speed Racing 3D is very fast racing cars with furious driving to win the competition and leave all competitors and rally drivers behind! Speed is need of the hour in this drag race & extreme go karting league racing simulator.
- Feel the speed of kart driving,
- Smooth control with realistic steering,
- Free kart racing game play,
- Race on worst dangerous arcade tracks
